name: Raisin Plantains
author: milkdemcows
summary: A very simple and quick way to cook plantain. The great taste and texture of the plantain is complemented well by the raisins.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, or as needed
3 large green plantains, peeled and grated
½ teaspoon salt, or more to taste
directions: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat; cook and stir onion in the hot oil until slightly softened, 1 to 2 minutes
Add plantains; cook, stirring occasionally, until plantains are crisp and lightly browned, 5 to 7 minutes
The plantain has a tendency to stick together, so the more you stir the more the individual pieces will separate
Fold raisins into plantain mixture and cook until raisins are plump and heated, 1 to 2 minutes
